args.name: Everdawn Plains
args.description: The beginning of all things — a peaceful grassland bathed in eternal morning light.

args.name: Verdant Hollow
args.description: Beneath the roots lies a green cave, pulsing with life and the rhythm of nature's breath.

args.name: Greenrift Valley
args.description: The first boundary where the plains fracture into winding cliffs and hidden caves.

args.name: Abyssal Rift
args.description: A colossal geological scar that descends endlessly into the dark — silent and sacred.

args.name: Sunveil Expanse
args.description: A golden desert draped in sunlight and the ruins of forgotten civilizations.

args.name: Cinder Rift
args.description: Streams of molten fire carve through the earth, leaving trails of ash and embers.

args.name: Soulrift Abyss
args.description: Where flame meets spirit — the infernal depths where souls are forged and tested.

args.name: Tide Haven
args.description: A tranquil coastal haven where the sea meets the living land.

args.name: Frost Reach
args.description: The frozen frontier, where time itself sleeps beneath an endless white horizon.

args.name: Mistveil Grove
args.description: A mystical forest veiled in silver mist — home to ancient whispers and unseen life.
